feature.label: CobiGen Eclipse Plug-in
feature.description: The CobiGen is an incremental generator which is able to generate at least every text-base contents using templates. The CobiGen is also capable of merging Java, XML and Property contents. The only necessary input is a valid compiling Java-Class.
